mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_ID) FROM member WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberID} AND MEMBER_HUMAN = 'N'

SELECT MEMBER_ID AS memberID , MEMBER_PW AS memberPW , MEMBER_NAME AS memberName , MEMBER_HUMAN AS memberHuman FROM member WHERE TO_CHAR(MEMBER_LOGIN_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/dd') IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/dd') = TO_CHAR(MEMBER_LOGIN_DATE+1, 'YYYY/MM/dd') AND MEMBER_HUMAN = 'N'
